name: Slaughter by Starlight
description:
Slaughter by Starlight is a turn based strategy game where you take control of a mafia gang in the dark industrial town of Eastpoint, New Mexico. Your goal is to steal a strange new resource from rival gangs and government agents by managing gang members in tactical combat and eliminating your enemies.

How to Play

Move by Left Clicking an area within your character's movement range.
Attack by Left Clicking an enemy within your character's attack range.
Move the camera with the WASD keys.
Zoom in and out using the Scroll Wheel.
Rotate the camera by holding Middle Mouse.
Press C to enter into the player view, and X to return to the overhead view.
